project.name: lisa
project.display_name: Lisa - Staged Migration System for Gastown
project.description: Staged migration system that analyzes codebases, extracts work items as Beads, bundles them into Convoys, and generates .gt/ directory structure for multi-agent execution via Gastown.

ecosystem_role.description: Owns the staged pipeline (research, discover, plan, structure, reconcile) and the .gt/ directory schema. Ecosystem root for reconciliation.
reads_from: target project files (package.json, README.md, docs/, etc.)
does_not_own: Conductor state (task queue, file locks, agent lifecycle)
ecosystem_role.ecosystem_root: this repo (hosts reconcile and ecosystem scopecraft/)

commands.name: /lisa:research
commands.purpose: Stage 0: Archaeological rescue for abandoned projects

commands.name: /lisa:discover
commands.purpose: Stage 1: Extract semantic memory from project analysis

commands.name: /lisa:plan
commands.purpose: Stage 2: Generate roadmap with epics, risks, metrics

commands.name: /lisa:structure
commands.purpose: Stage 3: Create Beads and Convoys for Gastown

commands.name: /lisa:status
commands.purpose: Show migration progress and quality gate results

commands.name: /lisa:reconcile
commands.purpose: Stage 5: Cross-project alignment report and checkpoint

skills.name: discover
skills.purpose: Tech stack detection, semantic memory generation

skills.name: reconcile
skills.purpose: Cross-project ecosystem alignment and drift detection

gastown_concepts.bead: Work item with ID gt-xxxxx, acceptance criteria, evidence
gastown_concepts.convoy: Bundle of 3-7 related beads for assignment

personas.name: Solo developer with abandoned projects
personas.need: Context recovery and structured work extraction

personas.name: Small team migrating to multi-agent
personas.need: Structured work items for Gastown execution

constraints: All outputs are local files (no database required)
Plugins must degrade gracefully when ecosystem partners are absent
Allowed output directories: ., .gt, scopecraft (enforced by validate.py)

carlos.provides: .gt/memory/semantic.json (discovery output), gates.yaml (quality gate schema), scopecraft/ format
carlos.receives: Richer analysis reports, quality gate enforcement, market fit scoring

conductor.receives: Task assignment, agent lifecycle management, context rollover
